title: be02659
author: be02659
content: Hi Everyone!Wanted to do a quick intro about our platform.INTROGXG is a DeFi Gaming platform and comprises of 2 sites, GXGBet.com, our fully licensed crypto gaming site, and GXGCoin.io our defi site which allows staking and yield farming of our native GXG Token based on the BSC network.I’d like to think we are leading the way in creating a more inclusive gaming ecosystem and bringing something fresh and unique. Online players of our site earn GXG Tokens every time they play, irrespective of the gaming outcome, which can be withdrawn at anytime without the need to wager. By tokenizing our company and distributing 65% of gaming net profits to GXG Token holders, all our players are effectively shareholders of the casino.As shareholders, players can benefit not only from the entertainment value that comes with online gaming, but also reap up to 450% APY for staking and yield farming on our defi site. Since we will use 65% of net income to repurchase and inject GXG Tokens directly back into the mining pool in real-time, holders have the option to generate increased revenue or cash out our highly liquid GXG tokens at anytime.CASINOOur gaming platform offers over 200 industry-leading providers like Evolution Gaming, NetEnt, BetSoft, QuickSpin & Microgaming.Features;-   Sports betting | Live Casino | Table Games | Video Slots and more…-   Provably fair-   24/7/365 live chat support-   VIP loyalty program with multiplier for token earningsPAYMENTSWe currently accept:BTCBCHDOGEETHLTCTRXUSDTTetherMore options will be added in the near future. Utilising state-of-the-art security for fuss-free deposits coupled with lightning quick withdrawals all fuelled by blockchain technology, transactions are both highly secure, reliable and transparent.PROMOTIONSOur current range of promotions include;-   No deposit free spins for new signups-   100% bonus on 1st deposit (25x wagering of bonus)-   50% bonus on 2nd deposit (4x wagering of deposit + bonus)-   20% Bonus + Free SpinsMore free spins, giveaways, deposit bonuses and rewards like weekly lucky draws available by joining our Telegram group.Would absolutely LOVE any feedback from all community members here or on Telegram. We sincerely hope that by creating a more cohesive gaming environment, we can reward the largest contributors to the platform, YOU, the player.

comments.author: be02659
comments.body: Hope everyone is doing well!Just wanted to quickly announce GXGBet.com's FIRST ever signature campaign being launched here (or on any forum for that matter) which I'm really excited about. You can view the details here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5403778.0. Only 15 slots available and we're going to run it for a week first as we just wanted to see how it will be received. I plan to fund the escrow shortly so please ignore the part in the thread which states "Payments will be directly processed by GXGBet" as I've just realised this can be a sticking point for some members. Thanks everyone for making us feel so welcomed here in this forum and to our signature campaign manager Gianluca95 for his hard work in organising everything! Looking forward to a very long and fruitful relationship with all the community members here.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: First of all welcome here. You should buy a copper membership(https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promote) so that you can post image without the need to rank up your account so that you can have a good thread for viewers to easily read your casino content.I just notice that your casino has a mandatory KYC for all new users which I read on this https://www.gxgbet.com/en/contacts/terms-and-conditions . This is a major turn off on most of the users here in the forum. Maybe you reconsider excluding forum user so that you can get players from here. Lastly, The casino is very slow to load because the homepage when going directly on the link was displaying all your provider's logos which makes the loading very slow. Maybe you should improve that but the casino itself is neat and good.

comments.body: welcome to this forum, signed up try playing with 5FS for new users, all went smoothly.You should buy copper member to make your image visible, I try to quote the image but just got invalid image.I see you gambling webiste have a license, will the user be required to do KYC?

KNOW YOUR CLIENT POLICY

comments.author: rodskee
comments.body: Welcome to the Bitcointalk forum and also it is nice to see a DeFi gaming site popping now in gambling section .But my concern here is the KYC verification since you are  a licensed gambling site , is this mandatory ? or  there is a exemptions ?and like what all says above me? there is a need for Buying a Copper Membership for you to continue posting a image here ,

comments.author: GXGBet
comments.created_time: June 15, 2022, 09:44:20 AMLast edit: June 24, 2022, 08:23:33 AM by GXGBet
comments.body: Thanks so much everyone for the warm welcome. Sorry. I created a new account and upgraded it to Copper cause I realised I couldn't change my display name easily. I hope that's not a violation of some sort. Thanks again for your comments. With regards to the KYC concerns for the GXGBet.com site, I have spoken to management and I believe waiving this for all forum members here is not going to be an issue. Let me know if you run into any KYC problems and I will work something our for sure.I do have another slight issue, I'm not sure if its ok to post here. I tried posting the image using my brand spanking NEW Copper status, but got "bitcointalk.org image proxy: Invalid image" error. Any ideas? I did check the image link and it did load in a browser for me.[moderator's note: consecutive posts merged]

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk forum. I agree that you should buy copper membership to be able to post images that will make your ann thread presentable to see. Does both site need KYC or not?. Since you said that one if it is licensed and the other one is not so, does the licensed one have list of restricted countries? Sharing the list would be helpful if there are countries that is restricted to gamble on your site. I visited the licensed gambling site and it seems my country is restricted to access it.Quote from: GXGBet on June 15, 2022, 09:46:54 AMI do have another slight issue, I'm not sure if its ok to post here. I tried posting the image using my brand spanking NEW Copper status, but got "bitcointalk.org image proxy: Invalid image" error. Any ideas? I did check the image link and it did load in a browser for me.Try reuploading the image to imgur for example and try to post it here again and make sure that it ends with the image extension.

comments.body: Quote from: GXGBet on June 15, 2022, 09:48:27 AMThanks so much for your feedback. Will let the team know and have them optimise the images or at least reduce image sizes so the page loads quicker.Is this the official account for the site now or the previous one?. Maybe the image is a little bit big for the forum. Not sure if that's the reason but trying image hosting service may fix this slight problem. That's what I always do when I post an image that will show as error when posting the images even if it ends with .png, .jpeg or other image format. It takes longer to upload it on imgur even though my internet connection is fine. My guess is that the file size is a bit too big for the forum. So here's the working one and  just copy this one for your ann thread https://i.imgur.com/cFYNfNp.jpeg

comments.author: vennali
comments.body: Website looks promising and hopefully delivers on what they've mentioned and sticks around for the long run. There are a few suggestions that I'd like to make on the sportsbook side of things(as thats where my interest lies). Huge number of live casinos that seem to be integrated. Which is nice too.

comments.body: Welcome to the forum and of course, some of the members have already given the things you need to know feel sad right now upon visiting of the platform it makes a restriction on my country I would like to visit and check the website to my self it if is ideal to me to play is this temporary or there is a list already of the prohibited country?.

comments.created_time: June 15, 2022, 11:43:02 AMLast edit: June 24, 2022, 08:27:44 AM by GXGBet
comments.body: Quote from: Peanutswar on June 15, 2022, 11:22:19 AMWelcome to the forum and of course, some of the members have already given the things you need to know feel sad right now upon visiting of the platform it makes a restriction on my country I would like to visit and check the website to my self it if is ideal to me to play is this temporary or there is a list already of the prohibited country?. comments.author: Ulven
comments.body: Hello I joined your site I like the background and the games you offer I deposited and placed a bet that was a winner but I can't withdrawError message: withdraw is not available because bonus is not won backDoes that mean I can't get the reward.

comments.author: GXGBet
comments.created_time: June 15, 2022, 12:29:23 PMLast edit: June 24, 2022, 10:07:35 AM by GXGBet
comments.body: Quote from: Ulven on June 15, 2022, 12:15:40 PMHello I joined your site I like the background and the games you offer I deposited and placed a bet that was a winner but I can't withdrawError message: withdraw is not available because bonus is not won backDoes that mean I can't get the reward.Thank you so much for your support and feedback. If you subscribe to a bonus when depositing on GXGBet.com, there is a requirement to wager a certain multiple depending on the bonus subscribed to. This can be anywhere from 1x upwards. The conditions are written on the bonus being subscribed (but may not be prominent enough as you need to click the 'i' button for details). Your dashboard should show the progress of the wagering amount remaining. Once that condition is fulfilled you should be able to withdraw the amount. If you continue to have issues, please contact support@gxgbet.com with your username and a screenshot of your dashboard or hit up our 24 hour live chat on the site. Thanks again for your taking the time to try out our site and really look forward to your continued support!

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: First of all welcome to the forum.The site’s name is really dope.I also checked the site and the design was good to be honest.My main question is that why you made your site a defi gaming site not just a regular casino?Moreover I can see that there are many coins available through which we can make a deposit and withdraw.Are the withdrawals automatic or are manually checked by the team?Also will love to see more promotions including deposit bonuses.Hope you will take the feedback positively OP.
